name: aesthetically
content:

in a way that relates to the enjoyment or study of beauty: aesthetically pleasing I like objects to be both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The three artists have very little in common aesthetically.
in a beautiful or artistic way: The table has various objects arranged aesthetically on it. See
aesthetic
